General.Name: Colonial Coal International Corp
General.Description: Colonial Coal International Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of coal properties in Canada. It owns a 100% interest in the Huguenot coal project, a coal project with seventeen licenses covering an area of approximately 9,531 hectares. The company also holds interest in Flatbed coal property with eight coal licenses covering approximately 9,607 hectares in the Liard Mining Division, northeastern British Columbia. Colonial Coal International Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5
